verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the words<WH1697> of the letter<WH5612> that Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> sent<WH7971> from Jerusalem<WH3389> to the residue<WH3499> of the elders<WH2205> which were carried<WH1473> away captives,<WH1473> and to the priests,<WH3548> and to the prophets,<WH5030> and to all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> whom<WH834> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> had carried<WH1540> away captive<WH1473> from Jerusalem<WH3389> to Babylon;<WH894>

Build<WH1129> you houses,<WH1004> and dwell<WH3427> in them; and plant<WH5193> gardens,<WH1593> and eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of them;

Take<WH3947> you wives,<WH802> and beget<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters;<WH1323> and take<WH3947> wives<WH802> for your sons,<WH1121> and give<WH5414> your daughters<WH1323> to husbands,<WH582> that they may bear<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters;<WH1323> that you may be increased<WH7235> there,<WH8033> and not diminished.<WH4591>

And seek<WH1875> the peace<WH7965> of the city<WH5892> where<WH834> <WH8033> I have caused you to be carried<WH1540> away captives,<WH1540> and pray<WH6419> to the LORD<WH3068> for it: for in the peace<WH7965> thereof shall you have<WH1961> peace.<WH7965>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel;<WH3478> Let not your prophets<WH5030> and your diviners,<WH7080> that be in the middle<WH7130> of you, deceive<WH5377> you, neither<WH408> listen<WH8085> to your dreams<WH2472> which<WH834> you cause to be dreamed.<WH2492>
For they prophesy<WH5012> falsely<WH8267> to you in my name:<WH8034> I have not sent<WH7971> them, said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> That after<WH6310> seventy<WH7657> years<WH8141> be accomplished<WH4390> at Babylon<WH894> I will visit<WH6485> you, and perform<WH6965> my good<WH2896> word<WH1697> toward<WH5921> you, in causing you to return<WH7725> to this<WH2088> place.<WH4725>

For I know<WH3045> the thoughts<WH4284> that I think<WH2803> toward<WH5921> you, said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> thoughts<WH4284> of peace,<WH7965> and not of evil,<WH7451> to give<WH5414> you an expected<WH8615> end.<WH319>
Then shall you call<WH7121> on me, and you shall go<WH1980> and pray<WH6419> to me, and I will listen<WH8085> to you.
And you shall seek<WH1245> me, and find<WH4672> me, when<WH3588> you shall search<WH1875> for me with all<WH3605> your heart.<WH3824>

And I will be found<WH4672> of you, said<WH5002> the LORD:<WH3068> and I will turn<WH7725> away your captivity,<WH7622> and I will gather<WH6908> you from all<WH3605> the nations,<WH1471> and from all<WH3605> the places<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> I have driven<WH5080> you, said<WH5002> the LORD;<WH3068> and I will bring<WH7725> you again<WH7725> into<WH413> the place<WH4725> from where<WH834> <WH8033> I caused you to be carried<WH1540> away captive.<WH1540>
Because<WH3588> you have said,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> has raised<WH6965> us up prophets<WH5030> in Babylon;<WH894>

Know that thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of the king<WH4428> that sits<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of David,<WH1732> and of all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that dwells<WH3427> in this<WH2063> city,<WH5892> and of your brothers<WH251> that are not gone<WH3318> forth<WH3318> with you into captivity;<WH1473>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> Behold,<WH2005> I will send<WH7971> on them the sword,<WH2719> the famine,<WH7458> and the pestilence,<WH1698> and will make<WH5414> them like vile<WH8182> figs,<WH8384> that cannot<WH3808> be eaten,<WH398> they are so evil.<WH7455>

And I will persecute<WH7291> <WH310> them with the sword,<WH2719> with the famine,<WH7458> and with the pestilence,<WH1698> and will deliver<WH5414> them to be removed<WH2189> to all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth,<WH776> to be a curse,<WH423> and an astonishment,<WH8047> and an hissing,<WH8322> and a reproach,<WH2781> among all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> where<WH834> <WH8033> I have driven<WH5080> them:

Because<WH8478> <WH834> they have not listened<WH8085> to my words,<WH1697> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> I sent<WH7971> to them by my servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> rising<WH7925> up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them; but you would not hear,<WH8085> said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>
Hear<WH8085> you therefore the word<WH1697> of the LORD,<WH3068> all<WH3605> you of the captivity,<WH1473> whom<WH834> I have sent<WH7971> from Jerusalem<WH3389> to Babylon:<WH894>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> of Ahab<WH256> the son<WH1121> of Kolaiah,<WH6964> and of Zedekiah<WH6667> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah,<WH4641> which prophesy<WH5012> a lie<WH8267> to you in my name;<WH8034> Behold,<WH2009> I will deliver<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon;<WH894> and he shall slay<WH5221> them before your eyes;<WH5869>

And of them shall be taken<WH3947> up a curse<WH7045> by all<WH3605> the captivity<WH1546> of Judah<WH3063> which<WH834> are in Babylon,<WH894> saying,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> make<WH7760> you like Zedekiah<WH6667> and like Ahab,<WH256> whom<WH834> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> roasted<WH7033> in the fire;<WH784>

Because<WH3282> <WH834> they have committed<WH6213> villainy<WH5039> in Israel,<WH3478> and have committed<WH6213> adultery<WH5003> with their neighbors'<WH7453> wives,<WH802> and have spoken<WH1696> lying<WH8267> words<WH1697> in my name,<WH8034> which<WH834> I have not commanded<WH6680> them; even I know,<WH3045> and am a witness,<WH5707> said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>
Thus shall you also speak<WH559> to Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite,<WH5161> saying,<WH559>

Thus<WH3541> speaks<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> Because<WH3282> <WH834> you have sent<WH7971> letters<WH5612> in your name<WH8034> to all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that are at Jerusalem,<WH3389> and to Zephaniah<WH6846> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah<WH4641> the priest,<WH3548> and to all<WH3605> the priests,<WH3548> saying,<WH559>

The LORD<WH3068> has made<WH5414> you priest<WH3548> in the stead<WH8478> of Jehoiada<WH3111> the priest,<WH3548> that you should be officers<WH6496> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> for every man<WH376> that is mad,<WH7696> and makes himself a prophet,<WH5012> that you should put<WH5414> him in prison,<WH4115> and in the stocks.<WH6729>
Now<WH6258> therefore why<WH4100> have you not reproved<WH1605> Jeremiah<WH3414> of Anathoth,<WH6068> which makes himself a prophet<WH5012> to you?

For therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> he sent<WH7971> to us in Babylon,<WH894> saying,<WH559> This<WH1931> captivity is long:<WH752> build<WH1129> you houses,<WH1004> and dwell<WH3427> in them; and plant<WH5193> gardens,<WH1593> and eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of them.
And Zephaniah<WH6846> the priest<WH3548> read<WH7121> this letter<WH5612> in the ears<WH241> of Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet.<WH5030>
Then came<WH1961> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Send<WH7971> to all<WH3605> them of the captivity,<WH1473> saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> concerning<WH413> Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite;<WH5161> Because<WH3282> <WH834> that Shemaiah<WH8098> has prophesied<WH5012> to you, and I sent<WH7971> him not, and he caused you to trust<WH982> in a lie:<WH8267>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Behold,<WH2005> I will punish<WH6485> Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite,<WH5161> and his seed:<WH2233> he shall not have<WH1961> a man<WH376> to dwell<WH3427> among<WH8432> this<WH2088> people;<WH5971> neither<WH3808> shall he behold<WH7200> the good<WH2896> that I will do<WH6213> for my people,<WH5971> said<WH5002> the LORD;<WH3068> because<WH3588> he has taught<WH1696> rebellion<WH5627> against<WH5921> the LORD.<WH3068>
